CustomField.description: Set the log level for which messages printed to the browser console. Whenever a statement is logged and the statements level is encompassed by the currently set General Log Level, the message will be printed to the browser's console..
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Set the log level for which messages are stored in the log stack for a transaction. Valid values are NONE, TRACE, DEBUG, INFO, WARN, ERROR, and FATAL. Any statements with a level equal or higher to the one configured here will be logged
CustomField.label: Client Console Log Level
